sphere_nonempty_is_R_or_C:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem normed_space.sphere_nonempty_is_R_or_C [nontrivial E] {r : exprℝ} (hr : 0 ≤ r) : nonempty (sphere (0 : E) r) :=
  letI : normed_space (exprℝ) E := normed_space.restrict_scalars (exprℝ) 𝕜 E
  (normed_space.sphere_nonempty.mpr hr).coe_sort
#align normed_space.sphere_nonempty_is_R_or_C normed_space.sphere_nonempty_is_R_or_C
op_norm_bound_of_ball_bound:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →L[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem continuous_linear_map.op_norm_bound_of_ball_bound {r : exprℝ} (r_pos : 0 < r) (c : exprℝ)
    (f : «expr →L[ ] » E 𝕜 𝕜) (h : ∀ z ∈ closed_ball (0 : E) r, «expr‖ ‖» (f z) ≤ c) : «expr‖ ‖» f ≤ c / r :=
  by
  apply continuous_linear_map.op_norm_le_bound
  · apply div_nonneg _ r_pos.le
    exact (norm_nonneg _).trans (h 0 (by simp only [norm_zero, mem_closed_ball, dist_zero_left, r_pos.le]))
  apply linear_map.bound_of_ball_bound' r_pos
  exact fun z hz => h z hz
#align continuous_linear_map.op_norm_bound_of_ball_bound continuous_linear_map.op_norm_bound_of_ball_bound
norm_smul_inv_norm':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- Lemma to normalize a vector in a normed space `E` over either `ℂ` or `ℝ` to length `r`. -/
theorem norm_smul_inv_norm' {r : exprℝ} (r_nonneg : 0 ≤ r) {x : E} (hx : x ≠ 0) :
    «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (r * («expr‖ ‖» x)⁻¹ : 𝕜) x) = r :=
  by
  have : «expr‖ ‖» x ≠ 0 := by simp [hx]
  field_simp [norm_smul, is_R_or_C.norm_eq_abs, r_nonneg, is_R_or_C_simps]
#align norm_smul_inv_norm' norm_smul_inv_norm'
norm_smul_inv_norm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- Lemma to normalize a vector in a normed space `E` over either `ℂ` or `ℝ` to unit length. -/
@[simp]
theorem norm_smul_inv_norm {x : E} (hx : x ≠ 0) : «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » ((«expr‖ ‖» x)⁻¹ : 𝕜) x) = 1 :=
  by
  have : «expr‖ ‖» x ≠ 0 := by simp [hx]
  field_simp [norm_smul]
#align norm_smul_inv_norm norm_smul_inv_norm
norm_coe_norm:

/-

theorem is_R_or_C.norm_coe_norm {z : E} : «expr‖ ‖» («expr‖ ‖» z : 𝕜) = «expr‖ ‖» z := by simp
#align is_R_or_C.norm_coe_norm is_R_or_C.norm_coe_norm
bound_of_sphere_bound:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem linear_map.bound_of_sphere_bound {r : exprℝ} (r_pos : 0 < r) (c : exprℝ) (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » E 𝕜 𝕜)
    (h : ∀ z ∈ sphere (0 : E) r, «expr‖ ‖» (f z) ≤ c) (z : E) : «expr‖ ‖» (f z) ≤ c / r * «expr‖ ‖» z :=
  by
  by_cases z_zero : z = 0
  · rw [z_zero]
    simp only [linear_map.map_zero, norm_zero, mul_zero]
  set z₁ := «expr • » (r * («expr‖ ‖» z)⁻¹ : 𝕜) z with hz₁
  have norm_f_z₁ : «expr‖ ‖» (f z₁) ≤ c := by
    apply h
    rw [mem_sphere_zero_iff_norm]
    exact norm_smul_inv_norm' r_pos.le z_zero
  have r_ne_zero : (r : 𝕜) ≠ 0 := is_R_or_C.of_real_ne_zero.mpr r_pos.ne'
  have eq : f z = «expr‖ ‖» z / r * f z₁ :=
    by
    rw [hz₁, linear_map.map_smul, smul_eq_mul]
    rw [← mul_assoc, ← mul_assoc, div_mul_cancel _ r_ne_zero, mul_inv_cancel, one_mul]
    simp only [z_zero, is_R_or_C.of_real_eq_zero, norm_eq_zero, ne.def, not_false_iff]
  rw [eq, norm_mul, norm_div, is_R_or_C.norm_coe_norm, is_R_or_C.norm_of_nonneg r_pos.le, div_mul_eq_mul_div,
    div_mul_eq_mul_div, mul_comm]
  apply div_le_div _ _ r_pos rfl.ge
  · exact mul_nonneg ((norm_nonneg _).trans norm_f_z₁) (norm_nonneg z)
  apply mul_le_mul norm_f_z₁ rfl.le (norm_nonneg z) ((norm_nonneg _).trans norm_f_z₁)
#align linear_map.bound_of_sphere_bound linear_map.bound_of_sphere_bound
bound_of_ball_bound':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- `linear_map.bound_of_ball_bound` is a version of this over arbitrary nontrivially normed fields.
It produces a less precise bound so we keep both versions. -/
theorem linear_map.bound_of_ball_bound' {r : exprℝ} (r_pos : 0 < r) (c : exprℝ) (f : «expr →ₗ[ ] » E 𝕜 𝕜)
    (h : ∀ z ∈ closed_ball (0 : E) r, «expr‖ ‖» (f z) ≤ c) (z : E) : «expr‖ ‖» (f z) ≤ c / r * «expr‖ ‖» z :=
  f.bound_of_sphere_bound r_pos c (fun z hz => h z hz.le) z
#align linear_map.bound_of_ball_bound' linear_map.bound_of_ball_bound'
